snippet: Mercedes-Benz’s concept car doesn’t showcase the technology of autonomous vehicles as much as it does the (yes, luxurious) experience of riding in one.
abstract: Wheels column; Mercedes-Benz's F 015 autonomous concept car is luxuriously designed and appointed, and demonstration models are offering a pre-programmed feel for what self-driving technology might feel like.
lead_paragraph: Mercedes-Benz’s concept car doesn’t showcase the technology of autonomous vehicles as much as it does the (yes, luxurious) experience of riding in one.

headline.main: Video Feature: Inside the F 015, Mercedes’s Self-Driving Car
headline.print_headline: Inside the F 015, Mercedes’s Self-Driving Car
